title: My Ship
lyrics:
My ship has sails that are made of silk
The decks are trimmed with gold
And of jam and spice there's a paradise in the hold
My ship's aglow with a million pearls
And rubies fill each bin

The sun sits high in a sapphire sky when my ship comes in



Whoa, ship comes in

Yeah



I can wait the years 'til it appears

One fine day one spring

But the pearls and such they won't mean much

If there's missing just one thing



I do not care if that day arrives

That dream need never be

If the ship I sing doesn't also bring

My own true love back to me



If the ship I sing doesn't also bring my true love, oh no

Bring my true love, oh

Bring my true love

Back to me

Oh-oh-oh oh oh oh
